definition: Yalu River, forming part of the China-Korea border
duck/CL:隻|只[zhi1]/(slang) male prostitute
green
river/CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]
surname Jiang

sentences.english: North Korean soldier stands guard beside the Yalu River near the North Korean town of Sinuiju.
sentences.chinese: 一名朝鲜军人在朝鲜新义州附近的鸭绿江旁站岗。

sentences.english: Yalu River boat tours are the most popular means of gazing at North Korea—and North Koreans.
sentences.chinese: 船游鸭绿江是远观朝鲜景色和朝鲜人最常用的方式。

sentences.english: Korea and China are separated by only the Yalu River.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜和中国只隔一条鸭绿江。

sentences.english: The 7th Infantry Division was to complete its advance to the Yalu.
sentences.chinese: 第7步兵师的任务是完成挺进鸭绿江的行动。

sentences.english: A steel railway bridge spans the Yalu River.
sentences.chinese: 鸭绿江上有一座钢铁大桥。

sentences.english: The Great Wall east to Shanhaiguan, West to Gansu and east to Jiayuguan, the Yalu River.
sentences.chinese: 长城东起山海关，西至甘肃嘉峪关，东至鸭绿江。

sentences.english: Hwanggumpyong is a sandy island at the mouth of the Yalu river that divides North Korea from China.
sentences.chinese: 黄古勇是个沙岛位于分隔中国与北韩的鸭绿江口。

sentences.english: Then they moved toward the Yalu River, the border between North Korea and China.
sentences.chinese: 然后，他们鸭绿江，朝鲜和中国之间的边界走向。

definition: Tumen river in Jilin province 吉林省, forming the eastern border between China and North Korea

variant of 圖們江|图们江[Tu2 men2 jiang1]
Nenjiang county in Heihe 黑河[Hei1 he2], Heilongjiang
Tumen county level city in Yanbian Korean autonomous prefecture 延邊朝鮮族自治州|延边朝鲜族自治州, Jilin
Jinzhou prefecture-level city in Liaoning province 遼寧省|辽宁省 in northeast China
Vladivostok/Ming and Qing name for Vladivostok 符拉迪沃斯托克 and the province around it
North Korea
Pyongyang, capital of North Korea
Shin'ŭiju, capital of North Pyong'an Province, North Korea
Shanhai Pass in Hebei, at the eastern terminus of the Ming dynasty Great Wall/Shanhaiguan district of Qinhuangdao city 秦皇島市|秦皇岛市[Qin2 huang2 dao3 shi4], Hebei
Volga River
Hun River
Argun River of Mongolia and Heilongjiang province, tributary of Heilongjiang River 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1]
